title: Pathian hmangaihna chungnung ber
lyrics:
Pathian hmangaihna chungnung ber,
Van lawmna leia lo lang;
Kan thinlung tlawm hi rawn luah la,
I rinawmzia lantirin.
Isu, khawngaiha khat i ni,
Hmangaihna tawp nei lo thianghlim;
Min kan la, i chhandamnain.
Nang ngai thinlunglah lut rawh.

Min rawn pawl la i Thlarauvin,
Thinlung ngui leh chau zawngte;
Kan rochan Nang nen luah dunin,
Chawlhna tiam min thlen ang che.
Sual tih chakna hi la bovin,
Alpha leh Omega chu;
Kan rinna bul leh tawp ni la,
Zalenna min pe ang che.

Min chhan chhuak la, Engkimtithei,
Khawngaihna min chantir la;
Lo kir thuai la, cheng reng turin,
I chen nan min siam ang che.
Nangmah chauh kan fak fo vang che,
I rawng pawh kan bawl fo vang;
Bang lova tawngtai leh fakin,
I hmangaih kan chhuang ber ang.

I thil siam tharah min siam la,
Thianghlim bawlhhlawhh kai lovin;
Chhandamna famkim chu changin,
Nangmah nen inrem lehin.
Ni tin ropui deuh euh zelin,
Vanramnuam kan thlen thlengin;
Chutah kan lallukhum dahin,
Hmangaih fakin kan leng ang.
